title: Hour 2: Chris Cote...The No Man
description:
A George Clooney story has us asking what YOU would do if you were given a duffle bag of $1,000,000. We continue to discuss the infighting amongst NFL owners as the Daniel Snyder story continues and heads toward Jeff Bezos' Amazon broadcast tonight. Then, what's the bigger game: Cowboys-Eagles or Chiefs-Bills? Plus, Dan and Witty share their greatest athletic achievements, and we have some more plans falling though.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
